full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI BLA BRGYUD GSOL 'DEBS BAR CHAD KUN SEL ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @003A *, ,(CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING GI BLA BRGYUD GSOL 'DEBS 'DI NI, RANG GI 'DOD PA DANG KHYAD PAR KO SHRI BLO BZANG 'JAM DPAL SOGS, RANG GI GRVA TSANG RNAMS KYIS RGYUN DU BSKANG NGA'I SNGON DU CHOS SKYONG CHEN PO'I BLA BRGYUD GSOL 'DEBS 'DON RGYU ZHIG DGOS ZER BA'I BSTUN NAS, CHOS RJE'I THA SHAL SKAL BZANG MING CAN BDAG GIS BSGRIGS PA LA, MKHAS RNAMS BZOD PAR MDZAD DU GSOL, ,YI GE PA NI RANG PI LIG THU BLO BZANG RIG GROL LO, ,)
